movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: The epic continuation of the Dune saga as Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to seek revenge against those who destroyed his family.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora as a familiar threat returns.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell returns to train a new generation.

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Reality Check
comedy.description: Kevin Hart returns with his signature high-energy humor about family, fame, and the ridiculousness of everyday life.

comedy.title: Ali Wong: Don Wong
comedy.description: Ali Wong's hilarious take on money, power, desire, and her own personal journey in the comedy world.

comedy.title: Dave Chappelle Live
comedy.description: The legendary comedian returns with his sharp, thought-provoking, and boundary-pushing stand-up comedy.

comedy.title: Trevor Noah: Off the Record
comedy.description: Trevor Noah shares his unique perspective on current events, culture, and his personal experiences.

comedy.title: John Mulaney: From Scratch
comedy.description: John Mulaney's triumphant return to stand-up with all-new material about his life and recent experiences.

music.title: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour
music.description: A journey through all of Taylor Swift's musical eras with spectacular production and surprise songs.

music.title: Beyoncé: Renaissance World Tour
music.description: Beyoncé celebrates her groundbreaking Renaissance album with this spectacular visual and musical experience.

music.title: Ed Sheeran: +-=÷× Tour
music.description: Ed Sheeran performs hits from his entire catalog in this intimate stadium experience.

music.title: Coldplay: Music of the Spheres
music.description: A spectacular show featuring Coldplay's greatest hits and new material with stunning visual effects.

music.title: The Weeknd: After Hours Til Dawn
music.description: The Weeknd brings his dark, cinematic vision to life with this stadium spectacular.

festivals.title: Coachella Weekend 1
festivals.description: The iconic music and arts festival featuring top musical acts, art installations, and food experiences.

festivals.title: Lollapalooza
festivals.description: Chicago's premier music festival featuring rock, hip-hop, EDM, and more across multiple stages.

festivals.title: Glastonbury Festival
festivals.description: The legendary UK festival featuring diverse music, theater, comedy, and arts across 900 acres.

festivals.title: SXSW Music Festival
festivals.description: The convergence of tech, film, and music with hundreds of performances across Austin venues.

festivals.title: Tomorrowland
festivals.description: The world's most spectacular electronic dance music festival with mind-blowing stage production.
